title: Key Fragments not dropping for my account
body:
I am currently on 28 wins (26 ARAM and 2 Normals) without a key fragment. Has Riot changed the ability to obtain fragments through ARAM, or am I experiencing some sort of bug? 

I've had periods where key fragments have been scarce, but this seems a bit ridiculous.

replies.body: I believe key fragments will only drop if you have a chest you can open, or when you have no chests the drop rate is virtually zero.  I seem to only get drops when I have a chest available.
Having a chest and having them available have no affect on key drops.
Are you sure about that? Because I have never gotten a key fragment when a chest was not available for me.
Care to share how you know for sure?

It should be common knowledge by now. Keys and chest drops are separate from each other. They do not affect the other in anyway at all.

Chests drop from getting an S or higher from you or a pre-made with you on a champion that doesn't already have a chest.

Keys are simply by winning a game. But it is _**Pure RNG**_. Meaning it's a chance they will drop. This chance is increased the more people in a pre-made as well. But they are on a nonlinear drop chance, this means that once you earn a key frag the next one has a lower chance and so on for every time you earn a key frag. Then after 30 days from your first key frag drop the chance resets back to it's starting value.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide

it does not say anywhere that you need to have a chest available in order to earn a key. They always have a chance at dropping whenever you win a matchmade game. However, every time you earn a key fragment, the chance of the next one dropping is lowered. The dorp rate does reset about 30 days after you earn your first key at the original drop rate.
Keys fragments are Pure RNG when you win if you get them. And the more you earn then even lower that chance becomes. The chance is already low.
